name: SpinBall - The Silly Game
description:
Control the ball by rotating the pins and hit all the obstacles to get rid of them, before time runs out. 

  • Use Left and Right arrow keys to control the rotation of the pins. If you are playing on mobile then touch left and right sides of the screen to control
  • Some obstacles will leave a powerup when they explode. Collect those powerups by hitting it with the ball. Power ups can help finishing the level or make you invincible for a limited time.
  • Right now there are limited levels. We will be adding more and more levels as they are designed. The full game will be available on PlayStore and AppStore soon.
  • The game is made using Godot Engine 3.5. 
  • Complete tutorials of how we made this game will be available on our blog soon. 
  • Please share your thoughts/suggestions/feedback in comments.
